questions.question: Which software in the Microsoft Office suite is primarily used for creating presentations?
questions.explanation: PowerPoint is the dedicated presentation graphics program used to create slide shows.

questions.question: Which tab contains the 'New Slide' button to add the next slide to your presentation?
questions.explanation: The Home tab contains the 'Slides' group where you can insert a New Slide and change its Layout.

questions.question: PowerPoint allows you to export your presentation as a video in which high-quality resolution?
questions.explanation: Modern versions of PowerPoint support exporting presentations as 4K Ultra HD videos for high-quality playback.

questions.question: What is 'Meshy AI' used for in the context of digital skills?
questions.explanation: Meshy AI is a generative AI tool that can create 3D models and textures based on text descriptions.

questions.question: In the Home tab, which group allows you to insert Shapes like rectangles, arrows, and circles?
questions.explanation: The Drawing group on the Home tab provides quick access to the Shapes gallery.

questions.question: To remove the unwanted background from an inserted picture, which tool appears when you select the image?
questions.explanation: The 'Remove Background' tool automatically detects and removes the background of an image.

questions.question: Which feature allows you to save a short, looping animation of your slides to share on social media?
questions.explanation: PowerPoint allows you to create an Animated GIF from your slides, specifying frame rate and quality.

questions.question: If you want to change the arrangement of placeholders on an existing slide (e.g., from 'Title Only' to 'Comparison'), which button should you use?
questions.explanation: The 'Layout' button applies a new slide structure to the currently selected slide without deleting its content.

questions.question: In the Insert Tab, which feature helps you communicate information visually using graphics like Lists, Processes, or Cycles?
questions.explanation: SmartArt allows you to create professional diagrams (like org charts or process flows) quickly.

questions.question: Insta3D is mentioned as a tool for:
questions.explanation: Insta3D utilizes AI to generate and enhance images, often adding depth or 3D-like qualities.

questions.question: What is a 'Placeholder' in PowerPoint?
options: A box with a dotted border that holds content (text, images, charts) on a slide layout
questions.explanation: Placeholders are the containers on slide layouts where you click to add text or objects.

questions.question: Which group in the Home tab contains the buttons for Bold, Italic, Underline, and Font Color?
questions.explanation: The Font group contains all text formatting commands.

questions.question: To organize slides into logical categories (like chapters), you can use the ______ feature.
questions.explanation: Sections allow you to divide your presentation into labeled groups of slides for better management.

questions.question: Which shortcut key is used to duplicate a selected slide or object?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + D (Duplicate) creates an exact copy of the selected slide or shape immediately.

questions.question: The 'Add-Ins' group in the Insert tab allows you to:
options: Add more memory to the computer
Install extra tools and features from the Office Store
questions.explanation: Add-ins extend PowerPoint's functionality by integrating third-party tools or extra features.

questions.question: Can you insert a Table into a PowerPoint slide?
options: No, tables are only for Excel
Only if you paste as a picture
questions.explanation: PowerPoint supports fully editable tables via the Insert tab, similar to Word.

questions.question: Which tool in the Drawing group helps you arrange the order of overlapping shapes (e.g., Send to Back)?
questions.explanation: The Arrange menu contains commands like Bring to Front, Send to Back, Group, and Align.

questions.question: The 'Format Painter' in the Clipboard group is used to:
options: Copy the formatting (color, font, size) from one object to another
questions.explanation: Format Painter copies style attributes from a source object to a target object.

questions.question: When you export a presentation to video, does it include recorded timings and narrations?
options: Yes, if you choose to include them during export
questions.explanation: When creating a video, PowerPoint preserves recorded timings, narrations, and laser pointer movements.

questions.question: Which view allows you to see all your slides as small thumbnails to easily reorder them?
questions.explanation: Slide Sorter view displays all slides in a grid, making it easy to drag and drop them into a new order.
